page.title: 10SHOPPING & EATING IN YALDING
page.content: Although many people drive to Maidstone supermarkets to shop, both Nettlestead and Yalding support shops. Those at Yalding sell greengroceries as well as groceries and frozen food. There is a garden centre at Nettlestead and at Yalding the village forge still shoes horses as well as producing wrought ironwork and undertaking welding. Marinas at Yalding and Wateringbury are busy in summer, as are local cafes. Hampstead Cafe, Yalding, caters also for drivers and is open all year. In recent years it has become the custom that where possible public houses should offer a service of bar snacks to increase trade and this is so in our area. Some also offer restaurant service.
